channel.title: Death
channel.description:
I just learned that one of my best RS friends has AIDs. She said that her doctor told her she would die in 1 year. I think this is rather sad because she is only 12. Discuss how much you hate aids here.
For Future Reference: R.I.P Tazy213 A great person And a very dear friend to me

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]Perhaps when you stop accomplishing anything and begin slowly wasting away?

Nope. That’s when life is the best, when your free.

You’re a potato when your accomplishing alot, when your really involved in your social life and getting ahead in life. That’s when you deserve to die.

Tyler Durden:

The things you own end up owning you.

Tyler Durden:

God Damn! We just had a near-life experience, fellas. [/quote]

[quote author=pookey71 link=topic=27142.msg310948#msg310948 date=1160722363]

my best friend also has AIDS, i hate aids with every fibre in my being, i also hate blindness, i have been in that situation. best of luck to your best friend, give her my luck. tell her to live life to the fullest for her last year with us. im sorry,

best of luck,
h4xx0rz
bobby
[/quote] Thank you.
Its just so sad to think about. I just keep asking myself why the doctor told her. She would be feeling much better ithout that information bringing her down.

That’s be the WOSRT Thing.How did she even get Aids?You only get Aids at that ages if you a nyphromaniac(sp?)…
[/quote] She probably got it from her mother or father. Maybe her grandfather? Maybe she got it from her mothers breas tmilk. It carried in breadtmilk as well as genetics and sperm (ewwwwwww)

I dont understand how she got aids at 12 unless she started early,
And im pretty sure you cant get aids when your a fetus.[/quote] AIDs can be pussed on through inheritance, and it is also found in breast milk.
Here are the possibilities I made up.

  1. She inherited it from her parents. (probably)
  2. She got it from her moms breast milk. (probably)
  3. She started early (thanks Cheatest) (seriously doubt it)
  4. Shes bein raped by a 40 year old (doubt it, but not seriously)
  5. Shes a sick bastard. ( seirously doubt)

Read full topic

item.title: Death
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome or Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS or Aids) is a collection of symptoms and infections in humans resulting from the specific damage to the immune system caused by the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).[1] The late stage of the condition leaves individuals prone to opportunistic infections and tumors. Although treatments for AIDS and HIV exist to slow the virus's progression, there is no known cure. HIV is transmitted through direct contact of a mucous membrane or the bloodstream with a bodily fluid containing HIV, such as blood, semen, vaginal fluid, preseminal fluid, and breast milk.[2][3] This transmission can come in the form of anal, vaginal or oral sex, blood transfusion, contaminated hypodermic needles, exchange between mother and baby during pregnancy, childbirth, or breastfeeding, or other exposure to one of the above bodily fluids.
Infroamtion found at www.wikipedia.com

Read full topic
